name: CQ.themes.Dialog
doc: The theme-specific constants for CQ.Dialog.This class is a singleton and cannot be created directly.

props.name: ANCHOR
props.doc:
<static> The width of the input fields (defaults to "94%").
See TAB_BODY_STYLE.

props.name: BODY_STYLE
props.doc:
<static> The bodyStyle value for dialogs
(defaults to "padding:2px;").

props.name: BUTTON_ALIGN
props.doc: <static> The button alignment of dialogs (defaults to "right").

props.name: CORNER_X
props.doc:
<static> The horizontal offset in pixels to use when positioning the dialog
in a corner (de...

props.name: CORNER_Y
props.doc:
<static> The vertical offset in pixels to use when positioning the dialog
in a corner (defa...

props.name: HEIGHT
props.doc: <static> The height of dialogs in pixels (defaults to 360).

props.name: IE6_TITLE_MAX_CHAR
props.doc:
<static> The maximum number of characters for the header title
(defaults to 50). Applies to...

props.name: LABEL_WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The width of the field labels in pixels (defaults to 130).

props.name: LOCK_WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The width of the edit lock button (defaults to 16).

props.name: MIN_BUTTON_WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The minimum button width in pixels (defaults to 75).

props.name: MIN_HEIGHT
props.doc: <static> The minimum height of dialogs in pixels (defaults to 200).

props.name: MIN_WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The minimum width of dialogs in pixels (defaults to 360).

props.name: MSG_TARGET
props.doc:
<static> The msgTarget value for
input fields (defaults to "qtip").

props.name: PLAIN
props.doc:
<static> The plain value for dialogs
(defaults to true).

props.name: SELECT_CHECKBOX_ANCHOR
props.doc:
<static> The width of checkbox fields (defaults to "90%").
Since overflow of checkbox selec...

props.name: TABPANEL_BORDER
props.doc:
<static> The border value for tab panels
inside dialogs.

props.name: TABPANEL_PLAIN
props.doc:
<static> The plain value for tab panels
inside dialogs (defaults to true).

props.name: TAB_BODY_STYLE
props.doc:
<static> The bodyStyle value for the tabs
(defaults to "padding:15px;padding-right:0"). In ...

props.name: WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The width of dialogs in pixels (defaults to 520).
